jumbotron.description: Make your dream wedding come true, virtually.

tagline.description: Enriching Weddings Through Innovative Digital Experiences.

feat1.title: Virtual 360° Wedding
feat1.description: With Virtuwed, bring the concept of your dream wedding into our virtual platform, allowing guests to experience the sacredness of your wedding digitally.

feat2.title: Digital Invitations
feat2.description: Welcome to the new era of integrated digital invitations, directly linked to our 360 Virtual Room, and say goodbye to the old-fashioned digital invitation era.

feat3.title: Elegant & Exclusive Design
feat3.description: We craft the wedding concept specially for you and seamlessly integrate it with our 360 Virtual Platform.

feat4.title: Integrate your Wedding with our Best Features

package2.description: Everything included in Virtuwed Premium, Plus:

testimoni.title: What They Say
testimoni.description: Offering the finest solutions for your special moments to become unforgettable. Experience a captivating wedding journey.

cta.title: Create Your Virtuwed Now
cta.description: Immerse yourself in an unforgettable wedding experience with Virtuwed.

faq.description: Everything you need to know about our products and how they work. Can't find an answer? Contact us.

accordion1.title: What is Virtuwed?
accordion1.description: Virtuwed is a virtual wedding platform featuring digital invitations, a 360 platform, photo gallery, video call, live streaming, and more.

accordion2.title: What are the key features offered by Virtuwed?
accordion2.description: Key features include digital invitations, digital gifts, virtual reception, wedding photo gallery, video call, and wedding live streaming.

accordion3.title: What packages does Virtuwed offer?
accordion3.description: There are 2 packages: VIRTUWED Premium (2 Million Rupiah) for intimate weddings, and VIRTUWED Priority (10 Million Rupiah) with more professional services.

accordion4.title: Is there an additional cost for adding guests to VIRTUWED Premium?
accordion4.description: Yes, adding 100 guests incurs an additional fee of Rp.50,000.

accordion5.title: Why choose Virtuwed for your wedding?
accordion5.description: Virtuwed provides an economical and innovative solution to create an unforgettable wedding with affordable costs and accessibility from anywhere.
